data.lyric:
[ti:Lose Somebody]
[ar:Kygo/OneRepublic]
[al:Lose Somebody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lose Somebody - Kygo (凯戈)/OneRepublic (共和时代)
[00:04.95]Lyrics by：Kyrre Gørvell-Dahll/Ryan Tedder
[00:09.91]Composed by：Kyrre Gørvell-Dahll/Ryan Tedder
[00:14.86]It's a classic "me" mistake
[00:16.66]Someone gives me love
[00:18.05]And I throw it all away
[00:21.16]Tell me have I gone insane
[00:23.10]Talkin' to myself but I don't know what to say
[00:26.08]'Cause you let go
[00:28.65]And now I'm holdin' on
[00:31.96]I guess you don't know what you got
[00:35.08]Until it's gone
[00:39.52]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[00:42.91]Just to find out you really love someone
[00:45.87]Oh-oh and I do and I do and I do yeah
[00:52.48]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[00:55.82]Just to find out you really love someone
[00:58.96]Oh-oh yeah yeah
[01:02.61]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[01:06.40]So don't tell me it's too late
[01:08.37]Hearts are made to bend
[01:09.75]Baby please don't let me break yeah
[01:13.24]I knew I should've stayed
[01:14.82]'Cause now you're movin' on
[01:16.33]And I don't know what to say
[01:17.84]'Cause you let go
[01:19.83]Yeah you let go
[01:20.89]And now I'm holdin' on I'm holdin' on
[01:24.22]I guess you don't know what you got
[01:26.98]Until it's gone
[01:31.46]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[01:34.80]Just to find out you really love someone
[01:38.14]Oh-oh and I do and I do and I do yeah
[01:44.41]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[01:47.75]Just to find out you really love someone
[01:50.76]Oh-oh yeah yeah
[01:54.41]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[02:00.82]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody yeah
[02:07.15]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody yeah
[02:13.66]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody yeah
[02:20.22]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody yeah
[02:23.37]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[02:26.79]Just to find out you really love someone
[02:29.71]Oh-oh and I do and I do and I do yeah
[02:36.27]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[02:39.65]Just to find out you really love someone
[02:42.67]Oh-oh yeah yeah
[02:46.01]Sometimes you gotta lose somebody
[02:49.10]Ooh
[03:11.62]Sometimes you gotta lose some
[03:12.85]You gotta lose somebody
data.trans:
[ti:Lose Somebody]
[ar:Kygo/OneRepublic]
[al:Lose Somebody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.95]//
[00:09.90]//
[00:14.86]这是经典的追悔莫及
[00:16.66]曾有人为我付出真心
[00:18.05]但我却弃如敝履
[00:21.16]告诉我 我是不是无可救药
[00:23.10]自说自话 又苦涩得无从说起
[00:26.08]因为你已选择放手
[00:28.65]而我却仍难以释怀
[00:31.96]我想人只有失去了
[00:35.08]才会懂得珍惜吧
[00:39.52]有时候你只有失去了某人
[00:42.91]才会意识到谁是今生挚爱
[00:45.87]这就是我的切身体会
[00:52.48]有时候你只有失去了某人
[00:55.82]才会意识到谁是今生挚爱
[00:58.96]//
[01:02.61]有时候你只有失去了某人
[01:06.40]拜托 别对我说为时已晚
[01:08.37]人非草木 孰能无情
[01:09.75]宝贝 请不要让我伤心欲绝
[01:13.24]我才悔悟我当初就不该离你而去
[01:14.82]因为如今你已放下过往
[01:16.33]徒留无话可说的我
[01:17.84]因为你已选择放手
[01:19.83]你已选择放手
[01:20.89]而我却难以释怀

[01:38.14]这就是我的切身体会
[01:44.41]有时候你只有失去了某人
[01:47.75]才会意识到谁是今生挚爱
